p: The addition of soil extract also resulted in the attenuation of the light intensity (PAR) entering the water column. Thus, while the control mesocosms showed an average light intensity of ∼250 μmol PAR quanta m -2 s -1, the tDOM mesocosms showed on average ∼150 μmol PAR quanta m -2 s -1, which constitutes a decrease in light intensity by ∼60%.
